readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.95/e 93/k 94/t 1800 1950/i 136/y 2: 50s/6 15/farmer 4 19 0 Sam 17 13 0 Jodi 7 4 0 Kent 3 15 1/removeItem 136/removeQuest 22/pause 300/faceDirection Kent 2/speak Kent "嗨，@。快进来吧。"/move farmer 0 -3 0/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi 0 10 2/speak Jodi "啊，你能来真是太好了，@！你还带了鱼来！棒极了！"/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Kent 1/faceDirection Jodi 1/speak Jodi "山姆！你进来帮我收拾下鱼好吗？"/pause 300/speak Sam "……遵命。$a"/move Sam -5 0 3 true/proceedPosition Sam/stopAnimation farmer/doAction 12 14/move Sam 0 2 3 false/move Sam -4 0 3/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 500/showFrame 35/addObject 7 15 136/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/speak Jodi "哇，看来很棒的样子……闻起来也很新鲜呢！多谢你带来的礼物啦，@。#$b#肯特也抓到一条鱼，不过那个给他自己吃都不一定够！$u"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/speak Kent "呵呵。$h"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "唔……这鲈鱼真是脆！面包屑也糊得恰到好处！"/pause 500/message "我现在感觉就像是家庭的一份子。"/pause 1500/end warpOut
content.94/e 93/k 95/t 1800 1950/i 136/y 1: 50s/6 15/farmer 4 19 0 Sam 17 13 0 Jodi 7 4 0/removeItem 136/removeQuest 22/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi 0 10 2/speak Jodi "啊，你好！@！进来！这是鱼的味道吗？"/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Jodi 1/speak Jodi "山姆！进来帮我准备下晚饭好吗？"/pause 300/speak Sam "……遵命。$a"/move Sam -5 0 3 true/proceedPosition Sam/stopAnimation farmer/doAction 12 14/move Sam 0 2 3 false/move Sam -4 0 3/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 300/showFrame 35/addObject 7 15 136/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/pause 400/speak Jodi "哇，看起来质量绝佳的鲈鱼呢，@。多谢你带来的礼物啦。$h"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "唔……这鲈鱼真是脆！面包屑也糊得十分完美！"/pause 500/message "我现在感觉就像是家庭的一份子。"/pause 1500/end warpOut
content.44/f Sam 500/p Sam: sampractice/-1000 -1000/farmer 4 15 1 Sam 17 16 2 Sebastian 18 18 0/positionOffset Sebastian 32 -31/skippable/animate Sam false true 200 20 21/showFrame Sebastian 41/viewport 17 16 true/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 500/doAction 12 14/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 9000/stopAnimation Sam/showFrame Sebastian 8/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 800/speak Sam "啊，你好，@！塞巴斯蒂安和我正“玩音乐”呢。"/move farmer 0 3 1/faceDirection Sam 3/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sam "我们想组建一支乐队，但是不知要搞哪种音乐才好。选择实在太多了。"/pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 500/emote Sam 16/faceDirection Sam 3/speak Sam "#$q 76 null#说，@……你喜欢什么样的音乐？#$r 76 50 Event_band1#令人愉悦的流行乐。#$r 77 50 Event_band2#实验性质的硬摇滚。#$r 78 50 Event_band3#极富能量的舞曲。#$r 79 50 Event_band4#气氛活跃的乡村音乐。"/move Sam 0 2 1/speak Sam "你说怎么样，塞巴斯蒂安？我们就搞这个？"/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sebastian "……好。"/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 0/move Sam 0 -2 3/speak Sam "多谢帮助，@。有了我高超的吉他技术和塞巴斯蒂安的电子琴能力。我们一定会成功的！绝对会！$h"/faceDirection Sam 2/speak Sam "只需要再找个打架子鼓的就好了……$u"/pause 500/end
content.46/f Sam 1000/p Sam: playful/7 4/farmer 7 12 0 Sam 7 5 0 Jodi 17 7 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -6 0/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 300/speak Sam "啊，你好！@。我正想吃点东西呢。"/pause 500/speak Sam "来，让我给你拿点东西吃吧。"/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3/playSound dwop/specificTemporarySprite dropEgg/showFrame Sam 33/jump Sam/pause 1000/emote Sam 12/showFrame Sam 12/speak Sam "糟糕……真是一团乱。$s"/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi -10 0 0/speak Jodi "刚刚那是什么声音？"/emote Jodi 16/speak Jodi "*喘气*$s"/move Jodi -1 0 0/move Jodi 0 -1 0/speak Jodi "简直太可怕了！发生了什么？$u"/speak Sam "$q 80 null#……告诉她吧，@。$s#$r 80 -10 event_snack1#山姆把零食递给我的时候掉到了地上。#$r 80 50 event_snack2#山姆把零食递给我的时候被我弄掉了。#$r 81 -50 event_snack3#山姆故意弄掉的。他觉得这样很好玩。"/pause 300/speak Jodi "$p 80#谢谢你告诉我事实真相，@。不是什么大事。|山姆，你干了什么呀？！你这是犯什么病了？！$u"/faceDirection Jodi 0/speak Sam "真是对不起，妈。我这就打扫干净。$s"/emote Jodi 20/speak Jodi "谢了，亲爱的。$h"/move Jodi 0 1 1/move Jodi 1 0 2 /faceDirection Sam 2 true/move Jodi 0 7 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Sam "$p 81#你这样我很生气。不知你为什么要这样对我撒谎。$s|之前的事很抱歉。"
content.100/f Kent 750/p Kent/p Jodi: none/6 5/farmer 7 12 0 Jodi 5 5 0 Kent 7 16 2/skippable/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -3 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -2 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -1 3/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 200/faceDirection Jodi 1/speak Jodi "您好。@！我正在做爆米花呢。$h"/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 79/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 100/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 26/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 39/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 110/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 59/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/speak Kent "啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！$u"/faceDirection Jodi 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -1 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -2 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -1 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -2 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -1 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -3 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 100/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 80/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/speak Kent "那声音……$s"/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 70/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 100/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 180/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/emote Kent 12/faceDirection Kent 3/speak Kent "你知道这声音会让我想起战争的吧！$u"/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 75/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/faceDirection Jodi 0/playSound openBox/pause 400/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 500/playMusic desolate/faceDirection Kent 2/pause 800/showFrame Kent 16/pause 800/speak Kent "我有很多朋友都死在了那该死的战壕里。$s"/pause 800/emote Jodi 28/pause 500/speak Jodi "但是，亲爱的……你走之前可是最爱吃的爆米花了。$s"/pause 500/showFrame Kent 0/pause 500/pause 800/speak Kent "……世事是会变的。"/pause 600/faceDirection Jodi 1/pause 400/move Jodi 1 0 1/speak Jodi "*低声说* @……你能跟他说几句吗？$s"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/faceDirection Kent 0/pause 300/speak Kent "$q 215 null#（跟肯特聊聊）$s#$r 215 -25 event_popcorn1#这事怪乔迪……她本该知道的！#$r 215 50 event_popcorn2#我知道你内心很痛苦……但这也不能怨你老婆啊。#$r 215 -50 event_popcorn3#（撒谎）这事怪我……是我说要吃爆米花的。"/pause 900/faceDirection Kent 2/pause 700/emote Kent 28/pause 600/speak Kent "……$s#$b#真抱歉，亲爱的。我本该知道爆米花的声音会让你不安的。"/pause 700/move Jodi 0 1 1/speak Jodi "没事，亲爱的。$s#$b#我最不想看到的就是你不开心啦。我会竭尽全力让你心情好起来的。"/pause 500/faceDirection Kent 3/pause 1000/end dialogue Kent "我们家有你这个朋友我很高兴，@。我要为刚刚的行为道歉。"

content.rejectSam: pause 800/move farmer 0 3 2/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 800/showFrame Sam 37/emote Sam 28/speak Sam "我懂了……$s"/pause 800/faceDirection Sam 0/speak Sam "抱歉……是我搞错了。回头见。$7"/move farmer 0 2 2/warp farmer -1000 -1000/playSound woodyStep/pause 1000/end dialogue Sam "……$s"
